qas.question: Mahayana Sutras spread to China during what century?
What two countries after China was the Mahayana sutras spread?
When did Buddhism apread from India to Tibet?

context: In the <a0_0>2nd century CE<a0_0/>, Mahayana Sutras spread to China, and then to <a1_0>Korea and Japan<a1_0/>, and were translated into Chinese. During the Indian period of Esoteric Buddhism (from the <a2_0>8th century onwards<a2_0/>), Buddhism spread from India to Tibet and Mongolia.
